Text.Page: You can't go twenty meters without those {@LinkCreature:24#15#sandpaw hyenas} and {@LinkCreature:24#16#desertcrawler wolves} making a run at you. The villagers can't live like this, and the guards can't make their rounds. I need someone to cull the packs.
What a relief! With those scavengers out of the way, the guards can make their rounds safely.
How many of the hyenas and wolves have you killed? Any?
